english.segment1: I will be still. In the arms of my Savior. You calm my soul. As you sing over me. All of Your goodness. Follows me forever. I will live endured Your way
english.segment2: Chorus: You are good to me. You are good to me. Oh Your love fills my soul. And my heart will always know. God, You are good to me
english.segment3: I will be still. In the arms of my Savior. You calm my soul. As You sing over me. All of Your goodness. Follows me forever. I will live endured Your way
